about_me.description: My name is Dawid Syty. I live in Poland. I’m Software Developer since 2014. I’ve good knowledge of C++, Python(Django/Flash/WebApp2/), Javascript(basics React.js and Vue.js) and looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge and take part in projects that present a challenge.
about_me.service_one_description: I've developed middleware in C/C++, mostly on Unix systems.
